rules_text:
Blockbuster 7 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap seven untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell is a blockbuster, create a copy of that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
